parameters.name: address

200.description: An array of the latest blocks.

get.description: Retrieves all blocks in the blockchain, starting from the genesis block.

200.description: An array containing all blocks in the blockchain.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred while fetching the blocks.

get.description: Retrieves a block by its index in the blockchain.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Index of the block to retrieve.

get.description: Retrieves a block by its hash value.

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: Hash of the block to retrieve.
